did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.physdesc: This collection consists of a hand-sewn manuscript song book with homemade covers.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: German manuscript song book, 1816, Accession #11202, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item was purchased by the University of Virginia Library on September 20, 1995, from Bookworm and Silverfish, Wytheville, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a hand-sewn manuscript song book with homemade covers, May 21, 1817, containing twenty-two religious songs in German, twenty pages on ten leaves, with the names of Lewis Knode of Montgomery County and George Knode of Botetourt County, Virginia, in the front of the "notebook."
